acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements
Then the Set<?> [java.lang.Object@37cc103c, java.lang.Object@3dc42f56, java.lang.Object@386d0954, java.lang.Object@57d354fc, java.lang.Object@7af5cf2a] should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements

Then the Map<?, ?> {java.lang.Object@2c053537=java.lang.Object@141cb3a4, java.lang.Object@351bfccc=java.lang.Object@36fd028d, java.lang.Object@381f0bf4=java.lang.Object@16c574c4, java.lang.Object@a56277b=java.lang.Object@c3976d4, java.lang.Object@6c85dbe8=java.lang.Object@7dc97564} should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly 5 elements
